quotes.text: The very earth that Caelid rests upon, and Sellia, town of sorcery.
Of learning, and remembrance.
We swat at flies, snuff out flame,

summaries.summary_text: cut_content_combat_vo_bank leans on Sacred Flame, Pilgrim & Journey, Roots & Veins and Oaths & Vows across 175 lore lines.

quotes.text: O shapers of gods, meddlers in fortune.
I do not abide! By your suffocating Order.
Eveligne, show her the way...

summaries.summary_text: cut_content_eveligne_serpent_cultist leans on Oaths & Vows across 13 lore lines.

quotes.text: Death ought to be earned.
You're Tarnished. Then you're here to fight, aren't you?
Prepare to become an offering, once and for all.

summaries.summary_text: cut_content_guilbert_redeemer leans on Martyrdom & Sacrifice, Guardian & Threshold, Oaths & Vows and Betrayal & Fracture across 78 lore lines.

quotes.text: Brave Tarnished. Mighty warriors, who fought at my side.

summaries.summary_text: npc:110000 speaks directly: "Brave Tarnished. Mighty warriors, who fought at my side."

quotes.text: Long ago, ye Tarnished lost something most dear.

summaries.summary_text: npc:120000 speaks directly: "Long ago, ye Tarnished lost something most dear."

quotes.text: Elden Ring, O Elden Ring.

summaries.summary_text: This NPC utters a single reverent invocation — repeating the name of the Elden Ring as a prayer or exclamation, suggesting fixation or devotion to the Elden Ring itself (supported by lore_id f785799f4e9994d3). No motifs are listed for this entry.

quotes.text: It happened an age ago.

summaries.summary_text: This NPC refers to events in a remote past. No motifs are recorded for this entry; the single line of dialogue ('It happened an age ago.' — lore_id fbd811368a1efda0) is the sole basis for linking the character to antiquity.

quotes.text: Alas, this is the immovable fate of all Albinaurics.
It's only a quaint treasure, for we who cannot make the journey.
Let the curse take everything.

summaries.summary_text: npc:albus leans on Pilgrim & Journey and Guardian & Threshold across 31 lore lines.

quotes.text: It's suffused with the blessed wonders of the stars...
I was you, and only you. We were one...together.
You could have become Elden Lord, and I could have become Sovereign Eternal, eventually.

summaries.summary_text: npc:asimi_silver_tear leans on Sap & Flow, Oaths & Vows, Twinship & Mirrors and Pilgrim & Journey across 76 lore lines.

quotes.text: No time to waste. Let's see the stars.
Sister... Where did you go?
I've been waiting ever so long. Forever and ever, it seems.

summaries.summary_text: npc:aureliette leans on Twinship & Mirrors and Primeval Current across 5 lore lines.

quotes.text: Alright then. It's yours, if you can meet me price.
First, you hand me the runes. And don't try nothin', neither.
Makes no bloody sense anyway, why some no-name shithead like me should get called to the Lands Between.

summaries.summary_text: npc:blackguard_boggart leans on Betrayal & Fracture, Pilgrim & Journey, Roots & Veins and Oaths & Vows across 86 lore lines.

quotes.text: So Ranni's fate is kept in stasis by Starscourge Radahn...
I...am shadowbound.
If it's on the cards, I'd be glad to meet again.

summaries.summary_text: npc:blaidd leans on Oaths & Vows, Guardian & Threshold, Pilgrim & Journey and Gravity Wells across 163 lore lines.

quotes.text: If you are prepared to show resolve,
If you stay the path, you will face this blight, sooner or later.
Until the floodgates burst, unleashing eternal torment.

summaries.summary_text: npc:bloody_finger_hunter_yura leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Martyrdom & Sacrifice, Sacred Flame and Scarlet Rot Divinity across 129 lore lines.

quotes.text: M'lord... Have you ever wished you might be born again?
Amazing! I've never seen a golden needle, not in all my life!
Please, do be safe on your journeys.

summaries.summary_text: npc:boc_the_seamster leans on Rebirth & Cycles, Pilgrim & Journey, Oaths & Vows and Trickster & Mask across 186 lore lines.

quotes.text: Look at it. The culmination of perfection, burning, before our very eyes!
Has the guidance of grace returned to your vision?
I must be the one to record them!

summaries.summary_text: npc:brother_corhyn leans on Oaths & Vows, Pilgrim & Journey, Glintstone & Crystalline and Sacred Flame across 167 lore lines.

quotes.text: (dummyText)

quotes.text: When grace is sullied, it rots people from the inside. Breaks them.
Then you are a blight.
Following only the guidance of the great Elden Ring.

summaries.summary_text: npc:d_hunter_of_the_dead leans on Oaths & Vows, Pilgrim & Journey, Fungus & Mycelia and Roots & Veins across 128 lore lines.

quotes.text: It is all that keeps your death and defilement at bay.
You'll be nourishment for the pox.
Give it your blessing. Defile my flesh with the seedbed curse.

summaries.summary_text: npc:dung_eater leans on Rebirth & Cycles, Oaths & Vows, Fungus & Mycelia and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 68 lore lines.

quotes.text: And that is how fate has answered…
I chose duty over my daughter's safety.
I'm no longer bound by duty.

summaries.summary_text: npc:edgar leans on Oaths & Vows, Guardian & Threshold, Betrayal & Fracture and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 55 lore lines.

quotes.text: This is how you die, you disgusting Tarnished.
Don't worry, I've got big plans for you. After you snuff it...
<screaming>

summaries.summary_text: npc:ensha_of_the_royal_remains speaks directly: "This is how you die, you disgusting Tarnished."; "Don't worry, I've got big plans for you. After you snuff it..." …

quotes.text: I am Fia, Deathbed Companion.
Brandish my rune, and take for yourself the throne.
I see. Then you must kill me.

summaries.summary_text: npc:fia leans on Oaths & Vows, Rebirth & Cycles, Martyrdom & Sacrifice and Guardian & Threshold across 131 lore lines.

quotes.text: The Fingers will surely guide you...
You. The one who holds both half crescents.
To find the coward's passage, through the dim cavern?

summaries.summary_text: npc:finger_reader_crone leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Guardian & Threshold, Sacred Flame and Primeval Current across 84 lore lines.

quotes.text: Now, go forth.
And so grace was extended, to your kind, the Tarnished.
I interpret the words of the Fingers, envoys to the Greater Will.

summaries.summary_text: npc:finger_reader_enia leans on Betrayal & Fracture, Primeval Current, Guardian & Threshold and Oaths & Vows across 104 lore lines.

quotes.text: I tell you though, what goes around comes around.
I would advise against taking the main gate into the castle.
Step back, you wretched Tarnished!

summaries.summary_text: npc:gatekeeper_gostoc leans on Guardian & Threshold, Pilgrim & Journey, Martyrdom & Sacrifice and Betrayal & Fracture across 92 lore lines.

quotes.text: The inheritors of the Great Runes; the shardbearers.
Make the journey.
You've received the wisdom of the Two Fingers, have you not?

summaries.summary_text: npc:gideon_ofnir leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Guardian & Threshold, Trickster & Mask and Rebirth & Cycles across 222 lore lines.

quotes.text: Spurned by the grace of gold.
Now I fight as Hoarah Loux!
Tarnished Warrior.

summaries.summary_text: npc:godfrey_first_elden_lord leans on Pilgrim & Journey and Rebirth & Cycles across 18 lore lines.

quotes.text: Deliver me unto greater heights.
Thou'rt unfit even to graft...
...To our home, bathed in rays of gold...

summaries.summary_text: npc:godrick_the_grafted leans on Sacred Flame and Pilgrim & Journey across 28 lore lines.

quotes.text: As many times as it takes. For you to understand.
the precious Empyrean was born. A new god to forge a new Order.
But the rotting sickness erodes one's memory.

summaries.summary_text: npc:gowry leans on Rebirth & Cycles, Scarlet Rot Divinity, Fungus & Mycelia and Pilgrim & Journey across 166 lore lines.

quotes.text: Henceforth, mine appetite shall be my sole companion.

Upon my name as Ranni the
Witch, thou wilt not go
unpunished.
Cower. Before Maliketh, Marika's Black Blade.

summaries.summary_text: npc:gurranq_beast_clergyman leans on Oaths & Vows, Rebirth & Cycles, Betrayal & Fracture and Guardian & Threshold across 121 lore lines.

quotes.text: My name is Hyetta, and I'm journeying in search of the distant light.
I'm sure I'll be a Finger Maiden.
A fingerprint grape, tried and true, what a wondrous thing! A fingerprint grape!

summaries.summary_text: npc:hyetta leans on Oaths & Vows and Pilgrim & Journey across 23 lore lines.

quotes.text: Of the swiftness of a wanderer's fury.
How can I help, here at the end of the earth?
You filthy thief.

summaries.summary_text: npc:imprisoned_merchant leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Betrayal & Fracture, Fungus & Mycelia and Trickster & Mask across 118 lore lines.

quotes.text: You have fought long and hard.
Think not, of the kindling.
Heed the fading grace. Listen to the Fingers.

summaries.summary_text: npc:intro_storyteller leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Oaths & Vows, Betrayal & Fracture and Guardian & Threshold across 324 lore lines.

quotes.text: Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...
May the flame of chaos find purchase within you.
And so, what was borrowed must be returned.

summaries.summary_text: npc:irina leans on Oaths & Vows, Pilgrim & Journey, Sacred Flame and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 106 lore lines.

quotes.text: All vessels are destined to one day break.
The esteemed warrior. Where did you spring from?
There were countless oil jars back where I'm from, actually.

summaries.summary_text: npc:iron_fist_alexander leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Rebirth & Cycles, Martyrdom & Sacrifice and Sacred Flame across 222 lore lines.

quotes.text: Though quite a lot of us got broken...
You put seeds in the big vase, didn't you?
You've cracked my heart.

summaries.summary_text: npc:jar_bairn leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Rebirth & Cycles, Oaths & Vows and Guardian & Threshold across 126 lore lines.

quotes.text: First he hid himself amongst the womenfolk to flee the capital, then hid from Radahn in that castle...
Oh, indeed, it is a foul fate for a land, to be without a ruler.
But I haven't the authority to raise you to knighthood as things stand.

summaries.summary_text: npc:kenneth_haight leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Oaths & Vows, Guardian & Threshold and Roots & Veins across 99 lore lines.

quotes.text: The honor of one's house holds little import in these lands.

It's on Mt. Gelmir, found off the old road that leads west
from the town of windmills.
What an easy mark I must have been...

summaries.summary_text: npc:knight_diallos leans on Oaths & Vows, Pilgrim & Journey, Betrayal & Fracture and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 105 lore lines.

quotes.text: These great snow-laden lands stretch far to the north.
Call upon me when needed.
They say the other half of the medallion is beyond the forbidden lands north of the Erdtree.

summaries.summary_text: npc:latenna leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Twinship & Mirrors, Guardian & Threshold and Oaths & Vows across 69 lore lines.

quotes.text: Let your flesh be consumed.
O, dearest Miquella, my brother...
O, dear Miquella...

summaries.summary_text: npc:malenia_blade_of_miquella leans on Scarlet Rot Divinity and Twinship & Mirrors across 13 lore lines.

quotes.text: Someone must extinguish thy flame.
In search of the Elden Ring.
Let it be Margit the Fell!

summaries.summary_text: npc:margit_the_fell_omen leans on Sacred Flame across 6 lore lines.

quotes.text: So shall I give of myself. This is for thee.
Beget Order most elegant, from my tender reverie.
Quench thy thirst, throughout thy frame.

summaries.summary_text: npc:marika leans on Rebirth & Cycles, Dream & Reverie, Sap & Flow and Oaths & Vows across 18 lore lines.

quotes.text: Lord of Frenzied Flame...
She is sure to seek the Elden Ring.
Destined Death.

summaries.summary_text: npc:melina leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Sacred Flame, Oaths & Vows and Primeval Current across 30 lore lines.

quotes.text: Well, even we had a place to call home, once.
Please, bestow unto me the yellow flame of chaos.
A frenzied flame to melt away the curses, suffering, and despair. And the Order, entire.

summaries.summary_text: npc:merchant_kale leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Sacred Flame, Betrayal & Fracture and Trickster & Mask across 171 lore lines.

quotes.text: Even the nightmares have abated... And now, though I can scarcely believe it myself, I can move as I please.
But I will not forget what you have done.
The pride she abandoned, to meet Radahn's measure.

summaries.summary_text: npc:millicent leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Scarlet Rot Divinity, Oaths & Vows and Fungus & Mycelia across 113 lore lines.

quotes.text: To experience the miracle, kneel in the basin at the back, and cleanse yourself with celestial dew.
Has been restored, to its rightful state of harmony.
She is Queen, head of the Carian royal family, and governor of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

summaries.summary_text: npc:miriel_pastor_of_vows leans on Oaths & Vows, Betrayal & Fracture, Glintstone & Crystalline and Rebirth & Cycles across 104 lore lines.

quotes.text: Why do you abandon me?
Ahh, I can see it, as clear as day!
duo

summaries.summary_text: npc:mohg_lord_of_blood leans on Oaths & Vows and Roots & Veins across 21 lore lines.

quotes.text: Smould'ring with that wretched flame of ambition.
The hands of the Fell Omen shall brook thee no quarter.
The Erdtree is firmly rooted, always.

summaries.summary_text: npc:morgott_the_omen_king leans on Guardian & Threshold, Sacred Flame and Roots & Veins across 38 lore lines.

quotes.text: Is that ash?
For indulging my emotions. Forgetting the mission. Punishment for offing his pawns.
I will remain, to summon the storm.

summaries.summary_text: npc:nepheli_loux leans on Betrayal & Fracture, Oaths & Vows, Storm & Tempest and Pilgrim & Journey across 115 lore lines.

quotes.text: Right over there, see that? Something's shimmering, I swear.
A fine mess, but how else could it end when daddy ambition is head over heels courting lady blasphemy.
Well, water under the bridge. Now we're squared up, how about we play nice from now on?

summaries.summary_text: npc:patches leans on Trickster & Mask, Pilgrim & Journey, Betrayal & Fracture and Oaths & Vows across 262 lore lines.

quotes.text: You're proving to be quite the puppeteer.
The task was left to you and the mongrel, was it not?
Have you decided to return what's mine, and proffer a sincere apology?

summaries.summary_text: npc:preceptor_seluvis leans on Trickster & Mask, Glintstone & Crystalline, Oaths & Vows and Sap & Flow across 224 lore lines.

quotes.text: The name of the spectral steed thou callest?
Which is why I would abandon this soil, with mine order.
But now the cat is out the bag, I cannot allow thee thy freedoms.

summaries.summary_text: npc:ranni leans on Oaths & Vows, Pilgrim & Journey, Dream & Reverie and Betrayal & Fracture across 225 lore lines.

quotes.text: Are you here in the Lands Between to take up the fight?
Though we may yet fulfil an old promise.
To take power and make it his own,

summaries.summary_text: npc:recusant_bernahl leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Oaths & Vows, Betrayal & Fracture and Martyrdom & Sacrifice across 94 lore lines.

quotes.text: Come, sweetings, become what ye desire.
I'll soon birth thee anew, a sweeting fresh and pure...
My thanks. For being born of my beloved egg, time and time again.

summaries.summary_text: npc:rennala_queen_of_the_full_moon leans on Rebirth & Cycles, Oaths & Vows, Primeval Current and Dream & Reverie across 38 lore lines.

quotes.text: by Mother's amber.
Will Mother hold us again?
Sleep tight, bound tight

summaries.summary_text: Rennala Sweetings pairs comforting, life‑giving imagery with cold longing: the phrase “by Mother's amber” evokes Sap & Flow (see lore_id 0c9800d7cf6840aa), while “That'd be nice, so very nice” leans into Frost & Hoarfrost (see lore_id e525992f1b88c3a4).

quotes.text: Is this outright impudence? Simple callousness? Or genuine kindness, I wonder?
Don't tell me it was you who opened the passage?
Perhaps you've heard of dreambrew, the nectar of the demigods, once forbidden to we mortals?

summaries.summary_text: npc:rhico_dreambrew_apostle leans on Dream & Reverie, Pilgrim & Journey, Trickster & Mask and Sap & Flow across 97 lore lines.

quotes.text: I can't even govern myself to step beyond the bounds of this ward...

Only to have their arms taken. Their legs taken. Even their heads...taken.
Taken and stuck to the spider.
I can see how and why immortal essence exists as spirit under the Golden Order.

summaries.summary_text: npc:roderika leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Guardian & Threshold, Rebirth & Cycles and Dream & Reverie across 154 lore lines.

quotes.text: I will pray. That you follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
And so I assume a guise when seeking new recruits.
I ought to be thanking you for treating me as usual, despite this appearance.

summaries.summary_text: npc:rya leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Trickster & Mask, Guardian & Threshold and Betrayal & Fracture across 170 lore lines.

quotes.text: And devour the gods with me!
A fitting sacrifice you shall be, for the Serpent King.

quotes.text: Worthy Tarnished, brandish the spear, and run him through.
I left the serpent-slaying spear in the Lord's Chamber.
That horrendous serpent... Praetor Rykard...

summaries.summary_text: npc:serpent_hunter_spirit leans on Guardian & Threshold and Pilgrim & Journey across 18 lore lines.

quotes.text: An imprisoned monster does not deserve an apprentice, or a daughter.
but she has a gift for spirit tuning.
I may be prisoner to you Tarnished lot.

summaries.summary_text: npc:smithing_master_hewg leans on Oaths & Vows, Pilgrim & Journey, Betrayal & Fracture and Guardian & Threshold across 124 lore lines.

quotes.text: And grace will surely guide us safe.
Our land's grown old, now ashen, and cold.
To our home, bathed in rays of gold.

summaries.summary_text: npc:songstress_of_haligtree leans on Sacred Flame and Oaths & Vows across 13 lore lines.

quotes.text: When Ranni shed her flesh, she shed the cursemark, too.
The very notion of life in death defies the Golden Order.
If Lunar Princess Ranni truly is the one who plotted that fateful night,

summaries.summary_text: npc:sorcerer_rogier leans on Betrayal & Fracture, Glintstone & Crystalline, Oaths & Vows and Pilgrim & Journey across 183 lore lines.

quotes.text: And so I'm stuck here. A fledgling sorcerer, with little chance of acquiring a key.
So, you've found yourself a glintstone key.
I never imagined that a bluntstone like myself would have the chance to play teacher.

summaries.summary_text: npc:sorcerer_thops leans on Glintstone & Crystalline, Guardian & Threshold, Pilgrim & Journey and Betrayal & Fracture across 93 lore lines.

quotes.text: But, fine. If it will help you, my apprentice, I offer my knowledge.
Very well. This is sorcery with which I'm not entirely unfamiliar.
So that we, fallen children of the stars, will beam once again.

summaries.summary_text: npc:sorceress_sellen leans on Glintstone & Crystalline, Primeval Current, Oaths & Vows and Pilgrim & Journey across 214 lore lines.

quotes.text: If you are loath to hunt your own kin, so be it.
Never forget. That the recusant fights to tread the path of the champion.
Like the shardbearers, vying for power in the wake of the Shattering.

npc:two_fingers speaks directly: "..."; "...!"

quotes.text: You, on the other hand, have your own home, which is a far cry from here.
I know you can do it. Do not dishonour House Shanehaight.
But do you see where it got them? King Morgott's rule would not be shaken!

summaries.summary_text: npc:viscount_shanehaight leans on Betrayal & Fracture, Oaths & Vows, Guardian & Threshold and Pilgrim & Journey across 63 lore lines.

quotes.text: Who stood up to the swirling constellations, halting their movement in a smashing victory.
So that Lady Ranni may tread the dark path of the Empyrean.
Only, we've failed to find a path leading to the city.

summaries.summary_text: npc:war_counselor_iji leans on Pilgrim & Journey, Oaths & Vows, Primeval Current and Gravity Wells across 156 lore lines.

quotes.text: To Castle Stormveil, on the cliff.
For an audience with the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
They are the purported masters of the grace that guides your kind, the Tarnished.

quotes.text: Now he gathers the corpses of former friends and foes alike, gorging on them, like a dog.
If the fates deign it, may we meet again, Tarnished.
And howling at the sky...
